column3: Latest;(Phnom Penh):------ Microfinance Institution AMK (AMK) announced that it will suspend all financial operations of all branches
column8: ------Core Bank New Temenos (T24).------The launch of TEMENOS (T24) Core Banking System (T24) to respond to the growth of the institution and provide a wealth of services to customers.------Financial services operations will resume operations on November 5
